name: SS-203x
description:
Hello! I am a 17 year old student and I'm learning to program. This game originally was a way to challenge myself as I do these kind of things from time to time. It is a classical meteor shooter purely made in CLI C++. The game is in its early stages and I plan to implement more features in the future (not sure when). I listed them in-game in the section "Dev notes". The gameplay is very simple. You move in a horizontal line and shoot lasers to destroy the upcoming wave of meteors. The music is done by Eric Skiff who kindly let's his music to be used by the public. I hope you enjoy it and would love to hear both negative and positive reviews! Thank You! :)

What does this game offer?

  • An arcade-like gameplay
  • Full-on ASCII art
  • A high-score system
  • Beautiful soundtrack

VERSION 1.1 RELEASED. Patch notes:

  • New types of meteors: 1-shots, 2-shots, undestructables
  • The laser has a 1 frame cooldown
  • Disabled the maximize button
  • Added a way to manually clear the high-scores
  • Removed the scrollbar (sort of)
  • A new menu entrance when turning on the game
  • Minor UI improvements here and there
  • Made the music volume lower
  • General performance improvements
